pages.text: The most basic $(item)Open Barrel$() multiblock is the Rain Collector.$(br2)Placing the $(item)Open Barrel$() in the world will allow the barrel to collect $(water)Purified Water$() during rain and thunderstorms.$(br2)To collect rainwater, the $(item)Open Barrel$() must have clear access to the sky and be placed a biome where it can rain.
If the $(item)Open Barrel$() is covered by a $(l:open_barrel/barrel_lid)Barrel Lid$() it can still collect rainwater so long as the lid is set to the open position.
